HPB.JO.summary: Hospitality Property Fund Limited is a publicly traded company and has been listed on the main board of the JSE since 16 February 2006. Hospitality is a specialised REIT on the JSE investing in the hospitality industry, providing investors with exposure to rental income streams from the hospitality sector. Hospitality's portfolio is well diversified across geographic location and grading and comprises 54 properties with more than 9,000 rooms in South Africa.
